frame.name: Gizmo
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains general words denoting equipment where the <fen>Use</fen> or purpose is not specified by the lexeme but (typically) by a separate expression. The words are described with respect to the <fen>Use</fen> for which the item is used or its typical <fen>User</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Use">coffee</fex> <t>machine</t></ex> <ex><fex name="User">dentist's</fex> <t>equipment</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the prototypical <fen>Use</fen> of a tool or device.
<ex><fex name="Use">coffee</fex> <t>machine</t></ex>
<ex><t>device</t> <fex name="Use">for making soap bubbles</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: User
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>User</fen> identifies the person who (typically) uses a particular tool. <ex> This drawer is used for storage of <fex name="User">dentist's</fex> <t>equipment</t></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Power_source
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Power_source</fen>marks expressions that indicate how a device is powered.
<ex> We use <fex name="Power_source">gas</fex> <t>appliances</t> in our kitchen</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Gizmo
FE.definition: <def-root>The complex artefact with a particular use.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: tool.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a device or implement, typically hand-held, used to carry out a particular function

lexUnit.name: implement.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a tool, utensil, or other piece of equipment, used for a particular purpose.

lexUnit.name: apparatus.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the equipment needed for a particular activity or purpose (mass noun)

lexUnit.name: device.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a thing made or adapted for a particular purpose, especially a mechanical or electronic contrivance

lexUnit.name: utensil.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a tool or container, especially for household use.

lexUnit.name: instrument.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a tool or implement, especially for precision work

lexUnit.name: equipment.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the items needed for a particular purpose.

lexUnit.name: gadget.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small mechanical device or tool

lexUnit.name: appliance.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a device designed to perform a specific task

lexUnit.name: contraption.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a machine or device that appears strange or unnecessarily complicated.

lexUnit.name: machine.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an apparatus using or applying mechanical power and having several parts, each with a definite function and together performing a particular task.

lexUnit.name: mechanical.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: of or pertaining to machines or machinery.

lexUnit.name: centrifuge.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a machine with a rapidly rotating container that applies centrifugal force to its contents, used chiefly to separate liquids from solids.

lexUnit.name: technology.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: machinery and equipment based on the application of scientific knowledge to practical ends

lexUnit.name: system.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a complex machine whose parts are working together as a mechanism or interconnecting network

lexUnit.name: core.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the central part of a nuclear reactor, which contains the fissile material.

lexUnit.name: player.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a machine that reads and decodes digital information.
